2001:917.name: cta-footer-main-container-display-content
2001:917.characters: Ready for more sales with a greener brand?

2001:912.name: value-call-out-copy
2001:912.characters: Be the change. Protect the planet, earn customer trust, and future-proof your brand with packaging that delivers impact you can measure and a story your customers will believe.

2001:1236.name: prduct-callout-copy
2001:1236.characters:
With ZeroBottles™, it’s a story of responsibility. As the first certified carbon-offset packaging solution for the nutraceutical and pharmaceutical industries, each bottle and cap is paired with climate action that offsets its full carbon footprint—from creation to delivery—through verified projects that deliver measurable results. 

Manufactured in HDPE, PET, PP, or PE plastics, ZeroBottles™ match your product’s needs while maintaining full compliance, performance, and cost efficiency, and can even be crafted with up to 30% post-consumer recycled content to meet upcoming regulations and retailer requirements. Backed by ClimatePartner, every bottle carries a traceable impact—real projects, real results. It’s not just sustainable—it’s accountable.

2001:909.name: home-page-copy
2001:909.characters: Win customer loyalty, meet regulatory standards, and reduce your environmental impact—all with sustainable packaging that’s supply-chain ready, easy to switch to, and priced similarly to traditional packaging.

value.characters: ZeroBottles™ are the first certified carbon-offset packaging solution designed for the nutraceutical and pharmaceutical industries. Each bottle and cap is manufactured to neutralize its environmental footprint through verified carbon offset projects—giving your brand a measurable and credible way to reduce impact without changing your supply chain.

2001:1276.name: page-copy-block-title
2001:1276.characters: What Is Your Product’s Sustainable Story?

value.characters: Protect your customers and transition your packaging to solutions that don’t leave microplastics behind.

Every year, over 100 billion plastic bottles and caps are produced around the world. Each one can take more than 450 years to break down—and when they do, they leave harmful microplastics behind. These particles are now found in the air we breathe, the water we drink, and the food we eat.

82:10749.name: home-page-hero
82:10749.accessibleLabel: Close-up photo of a bookshelf with old books.

2001:1282.characters:
With ZeroBottles™, it’s a story of responsibility. As the first certified carbon-offset packaging solution for the nutraceutical and pharmaceutical industries, each bottle and cap is paired with climate action that offsets its full carbon footprint—from creation to delivery—through verified projects that deliver measurable results. 

Manufactured in HDPE, PET, PP, or PE plastics, ZeroBottles™ match your product’s needs while maintaining full compliance, performance, and cost efficiency, and can even be crafted with up to 30% post-consumer recycled content to meet upcoming regulations and retailer requirements. Backed by ClimatePartner, every bottle carries a traceable impact—real projects, real results. It’s not just sustainable—it’s accountable.

value.characters:
BioBottles® are manufactured from traditional resins—HDPE, PE, PP, and PCR—that have been enhanced with our proprietary Plastic IQ® technology. This means they look, feel, and perform just like conventional plastic bottles during manufacturing, storage, and everyday use. 
The difference comes at end of life: if BioBottles® enter the environment as pollution, Plastic IQ® activates to accelerate their breakdown in a way that does not leave behind harmful microplastics.
Completely FDA food-grade compliant and shelf-stable for over five years, BioBottles® deliver the durability brands require with the sustainability consumers demand.
Protect your customers and transition your packaging to solutions that don’t leave microplastics behind.

Every year, over 100 billion plastic bottles and caps are produced around the world. Each one can take more than 450 years to break down—and when they do, they leave harmful microplastics behind. These particles are now found in the air we breathe, the water we drink, and the food we eat.

value.characters: ZeroBottles™ are the first certified carbon-offset packaging solution designed for the nutraceutical and pharmaceutical industries. Each bottle and cap is manufactured to neutralize its environmental footprint through verified carbon offset projects—giving your brand a measurable and credible way to reduce impact without changing your supply chain.

BioBottles® are manufactured from traditional resins—HDPE, PE, PP, and PCR—that have been enhanced with our proprietary Plastic IQ® technology. This means they look, feel, and perform just like conventional plastic bottles during manufacturing, storage, and everyday use. 
The difference comes at end of life: if BioBottles® enter the environment as pollution, Plastic IQ® activates to accelerate their breakdown in a way that does not leave behind harmful microplastics.
Completely FDA food-grade compliant and shelf-stable for over five years, BioBottles® deliver the durability brands require with the sustainability consumers demand.

Every year, over 100 billion plastic bottles and caps are produced around the world. Each one can take more than 450 years to break down—and when they do, they leave harmful microplastics behind. These particles are now found in the air we breathe, the water we drink, and the food we eat.
